title: The Sandman
description: Archie Beck is a crime aficionado. He reads about it, talks about it ... and commits it.He is a member of the 5in$life crime club, but for good reason is kept on the outside, looking in. Frustrated, he takes matters into his own hands and starts to rob the robbers.Afterwards, needing to lie low, Archie travels to England to track down a girl whose photo he saw on an associate’s phone. At the same time, he also has plans to gain the attention of the local community in his guise as 'the Sandman'. However, things don’t quite go according to plan. Love is on the cards, and there is a rival criminal who is overshadowing him.Needing to grab control of the situation, the Sandman starts a chain of events that sets all hell loose. And changes lives forever.
author: R.J. Towey
